channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 21:50 ATTENTION !!!Repelling the threat
item.description: 🟢 21:50 ATTENTION !!!Repelling the threat#Pologivskyi_rayon This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.
